wwv_flow_api.create_page_plug( p_id=>wwv_flow_api.id(14664952564564739) ,p_plug_name=>'Total Tool Cost' ,p_parent_plug_id=>wwv_flow_api.id(14661746936564707) ,p_region_template_options=>'#DEFAULT#:t-Region--scrollBody' ,p_component_template_options=>'#DEFAULT#' ,p_plug_template=>wwv_flow_api.id(10236192890271473) ,p_plug_display_sequence=>20 ,p_plug_new_grid_row=>false ,p_plug_new_grid_column=>false ,p_plug_display_point=>'SUB_REGIONS' ,p_plug_source=>wwv_flow_string.join(wwv_flow_t_varchar2( 'DECLARE', ' totalCost number(6,2);', 'BEGIN', ' SELECT sum(costbasis) into totalCost FROM bsa_view_project_tool', ' WHERE project_id = :P3_PROJECT_ID;', ' sys.htp.paragraph(NULL, NULL, NULL, ''style="color:red"'');', ' sys.htp.p(''$'' || totalCost);', 'END;')) ,p_plug_source_type=>'NATIVE_PLSQL' ,p_plug_query_options=>'DERIVED_REPORT_COLUMNS' ); wwv_flow_api.create_page_plug( p_id=>wwv_flow_api.id(14665132061564741) ,p_plug_name=>'Project Details' ,p_region_template_options=>'#DEFAULT#:t-Region--scrollBody' ,p_component_template_options=>'#DEFAULT#' ,p_plug_template=>wwv_flow_api.id(10236192890271473) ,p_plug_display_sequence=>10 ,p_include_in_reg_disp_sel_yn=>'Y' ,p_plug_source=>wwv_flow_string.join(wwv_flow_t_varchar2( 'DECLARE', ' projectTitle varchar2(100);', ' projectDescription varchar2(500);', ' projectDateStarted date;', ' projectDateEnded date;', ' netValue number(6,2);', 'BEGIN', ' -- Multiple values with INTO is special: https://www.oracletutorial.com/plsql-tutorial/plsql-select-into/', ' SELECT p.title, p.description, p.datestarted, p.dateended', ' INTO projectTitle, projectDescription, projectDateStarted, projectDateEnded ', ' FROM bsa_project p', ' WHERE id = :P3_PROJECT_ID;', ' -- Now format and print to the screen using the htp package', ' htp.header(2, projectTitle);', ' htp.header(3, projectDescription);', ' htp.header(4, ''Date Started: '' || projectDateStarted);', ' htp.header(4, ''Date Ended: '' || projectDateEnded);', ' netValue := PU.BSA_FUNC_CALCULATE_NET_PROJECT_VALUE(:P3_PROJECT_ID);', ' if netValue < 0 then', ' -- Set color to red', ' sys.htp.paragraph(NULL, NULL, NULL, ''style="color:red"'');', ' htp.p(''Net value: -$'' || netValue * -1);', ' else ', ' sys.htp.paragraph(NULL, NULL, NULL, ''style="color:green"'');', ' htp.p(''Net value: $'' || netValue);', ' end if;', 'END;')) ,p_plug_source_type=>'NATIVE_PLSQL' ,p_plug_query_options=>'DERIVED_REPORT_COLUMNS' ); wwv_flow_api.create_page_plug( p_id=>wwv_flow_api.id(15333286392842201) ,p_plug_name=>'Single Use Supplies' ,p_region_template_options=>'#DEFAULT#:t-Region--scrollBody' ,p_plug_template=>wwv_flow_api.id(10236192890271473) ,p_plug_display_sequence=>50 ,p_include_in_reg_disp_sel_yn=>'Y' ,p_plug_new_grid_row=>false ,p_plug_new_grid_column=>false ,p_plug_query_options=>'DERIVED_REPORT_COLUMNS' ,p_attribute_01=>'N' ,p_attribute_02=>'HTML' ); wwv_flow_api.create_report_region( p_id=>wwv_flow_api.id(10395360029692438) ,p_name=>'Current Single Use Supplies' ,p_parent_plug_id=>wwv_flow_api.id(15333286392842201) ,p_template=>wwv_flow_api.id(10236192890271473) ,p_display_sequence=>10 ,p_region_template_options=>'#DEFAULT#:t-Region--scrollBody' ,p_component_template_options=>'#DEFAULT#:t-Report--altRowsDefault:t-Report--rowHighlight' ,p_display_point=>'SUB_REGIONS' ,p_source_type=>'NATIVE_SQL_REPORT' ,p_query_type=>'SQL' ,p_source=>wwv_flow_string.join(wwv_flow_t_varchar2( 'SELECT ss.id, ss.name, ss.description, ss.datepurchased, ss.project_id, ss.ispending, ss.unitcost, ss.unitspurchased, ss.revenueitem_id, (ss.unitcost * ss.unitspurchased) as totalcost from bsa_single_use_supply ss', 'WHERE ss.project_id = :P3_PROJECT_ID', 'ORDER BY NAME ASC')) ,p_ajax_enabled=>'Y' ,p_lazy_loading=>false ,p_query_row_template=>wwv_flow_api.id(10254644259271484) ,p_query_num_rows=>15 ,p_query_options=>'DERIVED_REPORT_COLUMNS' ,p_query_no_data_found=>'No single use supplies have been assigned to the project yet.' ,p_query_num_rows_type=>'NEXT_PREVIOUS_LINKS' ,p_pagination_display_position=>'BOTTOM_RIGHT' ,p_csv_output=>'N' ,p_prn_output=>'N' ,p_sort_null=>'L' ,p_plug_query_strip_html=>'N' ); wwv_flow_api.create_page_plug( p_id=>wwv_flow_api.id(15333347251842202) ,p_plug_name=>'Total Single Use Supply Cost' ,p_parent_plug_id=>wwv_flow_api.id(15333286392842201) ,p_region_template_options=>'#DEFAULT#:t-Region--scrollBody' ,p_component_template_options=>'#DEFAULT#' ,p_plug_template=>wwv_flow_api.id(10236192890271473) ,p_plug_display_sequence=>20 ,p_plug_new_grid_row=>false ,p_plug_new_grid_column=>false ,p_plug_display_point=>'SUB_REGIONS' ,p_plug_source=>wwv_flow_string.join(wwv_flow_t_varchar2( 'DECLARE', ' totalCost number(6,2);', 'BEGIN', ' SELECT sum(unitcost*unitspurchased) into totalCost FROM bsa_single_use_supply', ' WHERE project_id = :P3_PROJECT_ID;', ' sys.htp.paragraph(NULL, NULL, NULL, ''style="color:red"'');', ' sys.htp.p(''$'' || totalCost);', 'END;')) ,p_plug_source_type=>'NATIVE_PLSQL' ,p_plug_query_options=>'DERIVED_REPORT_COLUMNS' );
